subject: Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Friend,
In accordance to my religious persuasion, I felt expedient to write
and inform you on the wicked conspiracy hatched under the supervision
of  Mr. Paul Abu of the Ministry of Finance and the governor of our
central bank, Mr. Godwin Emefiele and their cohorts, to divert your
fund to their designated account in Europe.
From my position as a fund transfer computer diskette operating
analysis officer with the central bank, I discovered that they moved
your fund from Accra to Lagos, and from Lagos they have moved the fund
to ABN AMRO Bank in Netherlands.I found out through the Central
computer data base that they are about to reroute your fund to JP
MORGAN CHASE BANK AMERICA.
With this, I felt that it is important for me to alert you on this
development. They still use your name and payment identification
number as the beneficiary but they have changed the account
co-ordinate and that is why they are frustrating you by asking for
money every time in order for them to perfect their act.I have the
payment reference number of the transaction and also I have
information on whom you should report this matter to for immediate
action and investigation. I do not need any gratification from you
either in cash or kind, I do this because of my religious belief.
I can never be a part of evil because the bible says " YE SHALL KNOW
THE TRUTH AND THE TRUTH SHALL SET YOU FREE" (JOHN 8:32). Please
respect my discretion in this matter. You can send an email to me so
that I can give you the reference number and the follow up information
on how you should go about this. I repeat, please do not expose my
person, it is not easy to get jobs around here and I cannot content
with these powerful individuals as they can go to any length for
revenge.
Thank you and Remain Blessed.
Rev David Yemi

subject: Re:   Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Rev David Yemi,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing this information. I appreciate your concern and willingness to help. It's quite alarming to hear about such a conspiracy involving Mr. Paul Abu and Mr. Godwin Emefiele.

I would definitely like to know more about the steps I should take to ensure the safety of my funds. Could you please provide me with the reference number and the necessary follow-up instructions? I want to make sure that I handle this situation correctly.

Also, I completely understand your need for discretion in this matter. Rest assured, I will keep our conversation confidential. It's unfortunate that finding jobs can be challenging, and I wouldn't want anything negative to happen to you because of your involvement in exposing this conspiracy.

Once again, thank you for bringing this matter to my attention, Rev David Yemi. Your assistance is greatly appreciated.

Best wishes,
Georgia
